alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 12:07PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, southeastern St. Johns, eastern Marion and eastern Putnam Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1207 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saint Augustine to Weirsdale. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Salt Springs and Andalusia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
